name: last.fm - Kind of Blue
description:
Made for Firefox+Stylish and Chrome.
A last.fm style that I've been working on for a couple of months now. I decided to release it because I figured it was adequate enough and some friends were bugging me for a release! Main colour focus is blue and a cleaner look to the default style of the site.


Other screenshots :
Library page - http://puu.sh/4sgbA.png
Album page - http://puu.sh/6s791.jpg
track page - http://puu.sh/6s7bA.png
Artist page - http://puu.sh/4sgaP.png
Profile page - http://puu.sh/4sg8M.png
Home Page - http://puu.sh/4sg9E.png
additional_info:
Full changelog is here - http://puu.sh/aX7Aa/bd1e6424b1.txt

August 17 2015 - Apparently last.fm has updated to some beta version. I'll wait until all functionality is re-added/fixed until I remake this style (if I ever get the time). 

August 17 2014
-Fixed color difference on track pages (really bugged me when I noticed it)
If you have any questions, comments, whatever, feel free to send me a shout or pm on my last.fm - last.fm/user/JayGEEGEEGEE
(i promise to update this some more, maybe)
